Scenario1-Primary_Member_Not_Part_Of_Con.TC-1: Given PRIMARY member, WHEN requesting to view the information of all members in the contract that he/she is NOT part of THEN should NOT be allowed to view members records and indicate the person is not part of the contract.

Scenario2-Adult_Member_Not_Part_Of_Contr.TC-1: Given an ADULT member, WHEN requesting to view the information of all members in the contract that he/she is NOT part of THEN should NOT be allowed to view members records and indicate the person is not part of the contract.

Scenario3-Child_Member_Not_Part_Of_Contr.TC-1: Given an CHILD member,WHEN requesting to view the information of all members in the contract that he/she is NOT part of THEN should NOT be allowed to view members records and indicate the person is not part of the contract.
